properties.name: camel.dataformat.base64.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the base64 data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.base64.line-length
properties.description: To specific a maximum line length for the encoded data. By default 76 is used.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.base64.line-separator
properties.description: The line separators to use. Uses new line characters (CRLF) by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.base64.url-safe
properties.description: Instead of emitting '' and '/' we emit '-' and '_' respectively. urlSafe is only applied to encode operations. Decoding seamlessly handles both modes. Is by default false.
